Sentencas: We demonstrate an electrochemical technique for the large scale synthesis of high quality few layer graphene sheets (FLGS) directly from graphite using oxalic acid (a weak acid) as the electrolyte.
Titulo: An electrochemical method for the synthesis of few layer graphene sheets for high temperature applications

Sentencas: One of the interesting observations is that the FLGS are stable at least up to 800 degrees C and hence have potential application in solid oxide fuel cells as a gas diffusion layer.
Titulo: An electrochemical method for the synthesis of few layer graphene sheets for high temperature applications
